name: Keep Dano Alive
description:
Dano and Luko are back at it again in an indirect sequel to our previous title Toaster Treasure. This time, Dano fell down a hole and Luko is tasked with keeping him well fed for as long as possible. Luckily Dano found a huge supply of Luko Coins and can fund Luko's new farm.

..................................

Keep Dano Alive is a 2D Farming and Cooking simulator where you craft food and upgrade farms.

..................................

Controls:

Movement : WASD or Gamepad Left Thumbstick
Interact : E or Gamepad A
Crafting Menu : Q/Esc/Tab or Gamepad Start/Y

..................................

Note from Blue Pin Studio

We hope you enjoy our game! It represents roughly 38hrs of programming and 38hrs of art over the course of 3 days. If you would like to follow our progress on our next project, check us out on Twitch.

..................................

Please feel free to comment below with the score or email me at info.bluepinstudio@gmail.com and i'll add you to the list! :)
